educationSubtitle: View a list of universities or programs.
addProgramSubtitle: Add a new program to a specified university.
aUniversityAlreadyExistsWithTheSameName: A university already exists with the same name
tableUniNameD: The english name of the university.
tableUniArNameD: The Arabic name of the university.
availabilityD: The number of seats for this university.
extensionDurationD: Extension duration in days to allow the students to update and upload any missing documents (e.g. acceptance letter).
deactivateD: This university will no longer accept any new applications once deactivated.
exceptionD: This will make applications to this university does not required acceptance letter.
masterUniTypeDescription: Determines which category this university falls under
